scenario.name: uas_recv_cancel forking test

SIP/2.0 180 Ringing [last_Via:] [last_From:] [last_To:];tag=123456 [last_Call-ID:] [last_CSeq:] Require: 100rel RSeq: [cseq] Contact: <sip:[$number]@[local_ip]:[local_port]> Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len]
v=0 o=[$number] 123456 654321 IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] s=B conversation c=IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] t=0 0 m=audio [auto_media_port] RTP/AVP 8 101 a=rtpmap:8 PCMA/8000 a=rtpmap:101 telephone-event/8000/1 a=fmtp:101 0-11
SIP/2.0 487 Request Cancelled [last_Via:] [last_From:] [last_To:] [last_Call-ID:] CSeq: [$inv_cseq] INVITE Content-Length: 0
